name: hyper-cutter

effect.black_white: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.
effect.black_2_white_2: Doubles cut's grass-cutting radius on the overworld if any party Pokémon has this ability.

short_effect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.black_white: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.
